title: AI Agent
description: Use page agent to get AI assistance with content creation, site management, and theme generation.

title: CLI Reference
description: Complete reference for all page CLI commands, flags, and options.

title: Collections
description: Configure content collections — posts, docs, and pages — with pagination, date handling, and RSS.

title: Configuration
description: Complete page.toml reference — site settings, collections, build options, deployment, languages, and images.

title: Deployment
description: Deploy your page site to GitHub Pages, Cloudflare Pages, or Netlify.

title: Getting Started
description: Install page and build your first static site in under a minute.

title: Multi-Language
description: Add translations to your site with filename-based i18n — per-language URLs, RSS, sitemaps, and discovery files.

title: Releases
description: Release history and changelog for page.

title: Templates & Themes
description: Customize your site with Tera templates, overridable blocks, and six bundled themes.

title: Theme Gallery
description: Browse all bundled themes with visual previews. Install community themes or generate your own with AI.
